title: Woman killed after accidental shooting in Daviess Co., KY
content:
DAVIESS CO., KY (WFIE) -
The Daviess County Sheriff’s Office is investigating an accidental shooting.
It happened Wednesday morning at Daviess County Fish and Game Club on South Chestnut Grove Road.
The coroner told 14 News, 73-year-old Mary Bryan died when her husband's gun accidentally discharged.
Authorities told us he was either loading or unloading a handgun when it went off, hitting Bryan in the chest.
We were told she died at the scene. Both foul play and charges are not expected.
